bibl.title: The Employment of Epithets in the Struggle for Power. A Case Study.
bibl.note: Roman imperial titulature and Greek papyri. - Context and employment of the epithet ἀήττητος in imperial titulature. - An extraordinary epithet. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Crises and the Roman Empire. Proceedings of the Seventh Workshop of the International Network Impact of Empire (Nijmegen, June 20-24, 2006)

bibl.seg: DE JONG Janneke, The Employment of Epithets in the Struggle for Power. A Case Study.

Olivier HEKSTER, Gerda DE KLEIJN and Daniëlle SLOOTJES (Edd.), Crises and the Roman Empire. Proceedings of the Seventh Workshop of the International Network Impact of Empire (Nijmegen, June 20-24, 2006) = Impact of Empire. 7 (Leiden - Boston, 2007) pp. 311-326, 1 tabl.
Roman imperial titulature and Greek papyri. - Context and employment of the epithet ἀήττητος in imperial titulature. - An extraordinary epithet. - Conclusion.
